title: Staff
context: [ยง348F-5] Staff. The board may hire an executive director, who may hire staff to assist in the performance of the board&rsquo;s duties. The staff shall be hired without regard to chapter 76; provided that the executive director and staff shall be eligible for participation in state employee benefit plans.
